Hutao chibi sight for war thunder

uploaded 14/06/25
Cat medic #furry #sight #goonersight #wtdraw #alltanks

Hello everyone, this is my first sight, so please do not criticize, I tried for a long time, made the sight a long time ago, but thought about publishing, after playing around I decided to share with you for free.

I think fans of this kind of thing will like it, because I made the sight specifically with what I wanted and you will rarely find on such a wonderful site.

If someone wants to suggest an idea for a sight, I will gladly accept it and try to make it. The only thing I ask is not to suggest meme pictures or anything like that.

#sight #helltaker #lucifer #helltakerlucifer #anime...
